reviewText: Grandson loves the stories. he is 2 and he walks around with hats stacked on his head.

ADORE this selection of classics - over half of which books we had from our now 33 year old son's childhood. I ordered new and used copies of the  ones we didn't already have and gave all 23 books with this DVD to our 2 and a half year old grandson for Christmas. The read along feature is superb and many of the stories are enhanced with music and sound effects. Awesome companion for the books.
My kids really like it a lot. Scholastic is the best, their DVD brings their books to life. Five Stars!
Too slow for a 2 year old.  Maybe she will like it when she is older and has the books actually read to her.

This is a great set of videos of some precious kids' books. I sent it to my friend who lives back east because they have 3 kids, and lots of inclement weather! She said she would be using them all winter!  Ideal for kids age 7 and younger.

As a second-grade teacher, I find the entire line of Scholastic Story Time read-along books to be an excellent and entertaining use of media to encourage literacy skills and familiarity with high frequency words!
How can you go wrong with Caldecott books?  Wonderful selection of stories.
Some of my favorites. Wonderful to have these quality stories in another medium
sent to our grandchild in a foreign county, he loves it.
Love the simplicity of these videos.
This is a nice collection of short videos featuring Caldecott winning books.
I don't like this stories. I can't find the message for the kids. Could be possible to have mos dvd in spanish?
